content: Hello there! It's nice to meet you, Jeyachandran. I must say, your resume is quite impressive, with a strong background in AI, Data Engineering, and Full Stack Development. I'm looking forward to having a technical conversation with you today. Let's dive right in. Can you tell me a bit more about your experience with React and Node.js?
Yes sir, I created a mini-application for React using 3.js 3D animation. In React I cooked the concept I learned.
It sounds like you have hands-on experience with React and Node.js. Can you elaborate on what you mean by "cooked the concept"? Did you implement any specific features or functionalities?

Yes sir, I created an application for event management. It is using the one-stack application using React and Node and Espress. It is a four login system and admin and club member and club head and student login. It is one of the best applications in my business.

That's impressive! So, you built a four-login-system event management application using React, Node.js, and Express.js. That's quite a comprehensive project. Can you walk me through some of the features and functionalities you implemented in this application? For example, how do users book halls and create events? And what kind of permissions do the different user roles have?
Yes sir, I created this application with very uniqueness. I will indicate Razerbay also. So the student register even and apply the payment option Razerbay I use.

So, you integrated Razorpay for payment processing in your event management application. That's a great feature! Can you tell me more about the Razorpay integration? How did you implement it, and what kind of payment gateways did you support?
